src:
Rumah di Bekasi dan Jaksel Jadi Favorit Milenial
06 Nov 2019, 10:28 by Vadhia Lidyana


Foto: Tim Infografis: Luthfy Syahban

Jakarta - Jakarta dan Bekasi menjadi lokasi favorit masyarakat mencari rumah di situs properti online seperti rumah123.com. Milenial jadi pembeli properti terbanyak di situs tersebut."Kalau kita melihat dari umur kami melihat bahwa kenaikan itu baru terjadi paling gemuk di usia milenial 25-37 tahun," kata Country Manager Rumah123.com, Maria Herawati Manik dalam Festival Properti Indonesia di Mal Kota Kasablanka, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).Ia mengungkapkan, area favorit para milenial ketika membeli hunian yakni di Bekasi, Jakarta Timur (Jaktim), hingga Jakarta Selatan (Jaksel)."Kalau area saya rasa masih di Jakarta Timur Bekasi, dan Jakarta Selatan. Itu masih top 3 penjualan kita," tutur Maria.Sedangkan, untuk harganya, ternyata milenial ini gemar membeli rumah dengan harga Rp 800 juta-1,5 miliar."Kalau secara percentage dari harga rumah pertama yang paling gemuk adalah Rp 88 juta-1,5 miliar," ungkap dia.Menurutnya, milenial kini punya kesadaran untuk memiliki rumah tapak. Tentunya, harga rumah tapak saat ini tak mungkin di bawah Rp 500 juta."Kalau sebelumnya paling gemuk Rp 500 juta ke bawah. Kalau sekarang sudah mulai berpindah, mereka sudah mulai aware bahwa untuk membeli rumah sudah pasti kalau Rp 500 juta ke bawah mungkin nggak akan dapat landed, tapi apartemen," ujar Maria.Simak Video "Dear Milenial, Ini Solusi Siasati DP Rumah Saat Ambil KPR"[Gambas:Video 20detik](fdl/fdl)
text:
Houses in Bekasi and South Jakarta Become Millennial Favorites
Nov 6, 2019, 10:28 by Vadhia Lidyana


Photo: Infographics Team: Luthfy Syahban

Jakarta - Jakarta and Bekasi are the favorite locations for people looking for homes on online property sites such as rumah123.com. Millennials are the biggest property buyers on the site. "If we look from our age, we see that the increase has only been the fattest in millennials aged 25-37 years," said Country Manager Rumah123.com, Maria Herawati Manik at the Indonesian Property Festival at City Mall Kasablanka, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019). He revealed, the favorite area of millennials when buying housing is in Bekasi, East Jakarta (East Jakarta), to South Jakarta (South Jakarta). "If the area I think is still in East Jakarta, Bekasi , and South Jakarta. That's still our top 3 sales, "said Maria. Meanwhile, for the price, it turns out this millennial likes to buy a house with a price of Rp 800 million-1.5 billion." If in percentage of the price of the first fatest house is Rp 88 million-1.5 billion, "he said. According to him, millennial now has the awareness to have a landed house. "Obviously, the price of a tread house is currently not possible under Rp. 500 million." Previously the fatest was Rp. 500 million and below. If they have started moving now, they have started to realize that to buy a house, it is certain that Rp. 500 million or less may not will be landed, but the apartment, "Maria said. Listen Video" Dear Millennial, This Solution Aligns DP House When Taking Mortgages "[Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (fdl / fdl)
